story_teamplasma_01_11000/2401_1001_0100: Colress, is this where Hugh disappeared?
story_teamplasma_01_11000/2401_1001_0300: Sorry, there was a bit of a commotion.
story_teamplasma_01_11000/2401_1001_0400:
Apparently a Pokémon came from the direction
we’re heading...
story_teamplasma_01_11000/2401_1001_0500: And it was desperately looking for something.
story_teamplasma_01_11000/2401_1001_0600: I also heard people saying it was injured.
story_teamplasma_01_11000/2401_1001_0700:
That’s concerning. Hopefully it’s not Hugh or
N’s Pokémon...
story_teamplasma_01_11000/2401_1001_0800: But if it is, it might give us a clue to finding them.
